spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ixitxachitl is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as its spellcasting ability (Spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). The ixitxachitl has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Vampiric Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the ixitxachitl regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

reaction.name: Barbed Tail
entries: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite.
{@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.
